Person.OrganizationName: Nampula Geomagnetic Observatory, Mozambique; Mucussete Antonio, Observatory operational support from Jean Rasson and John Riddick. Data processed by John Riddick and British Geological Survey. Nampula observatory is part of the INDIGO Programme (see http://nora.nerc.ac.uk/15125/).
